1.content:
"Ok Rai you can do this."You repeat to yourself as you enter the gates to your new school, Barrington Academy. It was one of the best elementary schools in a 1000 miles, only thing was it had a half a million tuition fee so it was pretty obvious that this school was for the filthy stinken rich. You where only able to go here because you were adopted by a very nice, very rich, couple. You had just gotten over the fact that you're room was bigger then the whole communal bed room of the orphanage and now they where sending you to a school where a year of tuition alone could have bought your old school easily.

You would have been perfectly happy staying at your old school but your new parents made it very clear that due to their money that just wasn't safe for you anymore. "I don't even know how a rich kid is suppose to act."You sigh as you enter the main building and head straight into the main office. "Ah young master Rai please follow me to your classroom," A tall middle age man says as he hands you a id slash credit card, " I'll explain the academy rules along the way." "Um sure but how did you know my name sir?"You were very confused, as far as you knew you had never met this man in your life.

"Well I wouldn't be a good principal if I didn't know our newest student's name now would I?"He replies as he leads you out of the office. "Now our rules are almost exactly the same as your old school but with a few extras." He leads you down a long hallway, "Number 1 is that some of your fellow students still need to wear protection during the day so I expect you to be respectful of them and not make fun or call attention to that." "You mean the kindergartens?"They were the only age group that you thought would be wearing them. "Yes and no,"The principal replies, "you see i was talking about every grade. There are at least 10 students in every class that still need protection, more in the lower grades."

You couldn't believe it, "Now rule two is that if your teacher malfunctions....." "Wait what?"You had never heard of a teacher malfunctioning. "Oh forgive me young master Rai, I forgot to mention that are teachers are highly advance androids. You see some of our students use to try and bribe our teachers back when we still had human teachers so in order to eliminate that problem we decide to get robots to teach our students."

The principal went on and on about the rules as you two walked along but you were still focusing on the first two. You would be in a class where some kids still needed diapers and were the class was being taught by a machine. "Well young master Rai this is your classroom," You snap out of your inner thoughts, "I'll leave you in the capable hands of your teacher." And with that he leaves, "Ok Rai you can do this," You think to yourself, "Don't make fun of the ones wearing diapers and act like the robot teacher is normal." As you reach for the door knob you begin to hear a very weird noise followed by a bright light before you black out.

11221.content:
A million thoughts flooded through Rai’s head as he was covered by the shadow, but one thought stood out among the others “Please don’t be a foot.” After all, Rai had barely enough time to move and the last thing he wanted was to end up like gum on the bottom of someone’s shoe. “Please don’t step on me, Please!” he screamed as he finally turned around, but he nearly fell back in surprise. It wasn’t a foot coming towards him, but a giant hand.

With a quick swipe, the hand scooped Rai up from the ground. Trapped in the hand, Rai began to scream for someone to help him: the robot teacher, his parents, anyone that he could think of. He dreaded what would await him when the hand opened, so he began to pray. “If someone’s out there, please tell my parents I love them...and that this school sucks!” Eventually, the hand opened and revealed a sight that Rai knew would scar him for life. Towering above him was the tallest girl Rai had ever seen. “Hey! Tiny boy!” the giant girl said, though to Rai’s poor ears it seemed as though she were screaming through a giant megaphone. “What are you doing here?” she said/screamed causing Rai to cover his ears. She noticed this and started to talk in a whisper. “Sorry, what are you doing?” she whispered in her hand. “Um, I-uh” Rai replied. Being 6 years old and shrunken to an inch wasn’t helping his confidence. “My name is Rai” he finally said “and-uh I got shrunk.”

“Well, that’s not the weirdest thing to happen here. Anyway, my name’s Allie. Nice to meet you.” Rai began to look completely at Allie. She looked about his age, but she didn’t look like she would be in a school for rich kids. She wore a purple striped shirt with baggy jeans and dirty sneakers. Her short, black hair looked like it was never brushed and was stuffed together in two pigtails. However, Rai saw her big, brown eyes and gap in her teeth and admitted she looked kind of cute. “So, Rai what am I going to do with you?” she asked and began to move closer to her desk. “Well, do you mind taking me to the teacher? I think they could help me get big again.” Rai said. “Oh, sure” Allie said. Rai felt like the luckiest 1st-grader in the world. “Thank you, Thank you!” he screamed, “If I were bigger I would hug…” Before he could finish, Allie moved her hand over to the seat of her desk. “But first, I wanna have a tiny person to play with” she said and looked on Rai with a creepy smile. Rai felt himself plop on the seat of Allie’s desk and felt even more scared than before. “W-wait, what?” he said timidly to the giant girl. “I-I don’t get it, you said you would help me.” Allie crouched down till she was eye-level with the one inch boy. “I will, but first I wanna do something really fun” she said. She stood up and turned around, looking taller than Rai thought she was. “I’m gonna sit on you!” she exclaimed.

Rai was freaking out at this point, yet he still couldn’t move. In front of him was the biggest, fattest butt on a first grader he had ever seen. While this was mostly because he was an inch tall, Allie’s butt still looked bigger than most girl’s her age. He knew that the giant rump in front of him would completely squash him, even if she just sat on his lap when he was bigger. “Allie, please, don’t!” he said to her. Allie couldn’t hear him or pretended she didn’t. “Your butt’s too big, it’ll totally crush me! I don’t wanna get sat on! I’m not your chai…Wait!” were the last words Rai said before he saw Allie jump up and begin to fall butt-first on her chair. Immediately, Rai felt Allie’s weight and fat engulf his body and face. Allie wiggled her butt on her tiny friend as class began to start and the other kids came in.

“Rai Smith...Rai Smith...Hello Rai, are you present within the vicinity” a robotic voice called out. The robot teacher and the other 1st graders looked around the class not knowing that their new classmate was getting sat on by the cute girl in the middle. “Perhaps, he has entered the restroom. Well, class talk among yourselves until I return, I need to go download today’s lesson.” the teacher said and it plugged itself into a computer like device. But, before it did… “Alicia Jinto.” Rai’s innocent looking captor looked at her teacher “Yes, I-902” she said with an innocent smile. “No, roughhousing with the other students, or you will be sent to the office again” the teacher said strictly. “Sure thing!, I don’t think I’ll ever try to crush the other student again!” The robot nodded and plugged into the computer. The other students cast waryful looks on Allie. She tended to have a reputation in the class as the "babysitter." A fitting nickname because whenever an adult wasn't around she would look for the nearest and smallest kid and make them her "super seat." For instance, the girl sitting next to her was the victim of Allie's rump just two days ago.

The girl was sitting on a bench at the playground admiring the pretty new emerald-colored dress her dad just bought her. She couldn’t be happier but was careful not to get any dirt on it. Enter Allie, who was also wearing an expensive purple dress, yet just fell butt-first into mud from playing on the swing. She didn’t really care though and walked up to the girl on the bench. “Hi, Emily!” she screamed at the girl. “Um, hi, Ally, h-how are you” she said. “Gooood” she said while skipping around the bench. Emily noticed the green and brown smudge on her backside and was scared out of her mind. “Um, well, nice seeing you, bye!” she swiftly said, but Allie seemed to appear from nowhere and stood right in front of her. “Mind if I have a seat?” she asked. “Uh, no” Emily responded “there’s plenty of room on the bench.” Allie put her hands on her hips and gave Emily a pouty look. “Not there, silly. I wanna sit on you!” she said as she turned around. Before she sat down, she felt two small hands push her rump. Emily struggled to keep Allie from sitting on her lap and was about to cry as drops of mud on Allie’s butt began to fall on her dress. “No Allie! Don’t sit on me. My daddy just bought me this dress” Allie looked back at her with a smirk. “Oh, come on, you’re even richer than me. Your dad can just buy you a new one!” Allie said why slamming her butt down on Emily’s struggling hands. Emily may have been about the same size as Allie, butt her hands eventually gave way to Allie’s meteor like butt slamming on her lap with a loud plop. “Ah, that’s better, now you’re my super seat!” Allie said while getting comfortable on Emily’s lap. Emily could only begin to sob as she watched the mud spread all over the front of her dress, and Allie’s crushing rump began to squash her. She cast the dirtiest look of all the kids towards Allie that day. The other kids in class had similar experiences to Emily’s like Jamie finding Allie using his stomach as a trampoline, with her butt bouncing and crushing him 50 times. Or there’s Tina, whose face once served as Allie’s seat cushion after she fell asleep on the ground during recess. Even though these experiences were tough for the kids, nothing could compare to what Rai was going through.

From all sides Rai felt crushed. He began to cry and scream, but his tears were just absorbed by Allie’s pants. Having a faceful of butt wasn’t the best first-day experience. What’s worse was that Allie’s jeans smelled like they were never washed, or that she just finished playing outside. The stench of grass, dirt and farts invaded his senses causing his eyes to water. The poor, innocent first-grader hoped to be free of his stinky, fat prison as soon as possible. He got a brief moment of freedom when the class stood for the pledge of allegiance, but his hopes for freedom were dashed when the giant butt slammed down on him again. However, this time he though he saw another kid catch a glimpse of him.
What happens next?

Over the next 30 minutes, Rai was subjected to what he thought the worst torture any human had ever experienced in the history of forever. Compared to being crushed by Allie, he would have preferred to be gum on the bottom of another kid's shoes. At least, he would've been able to see the rest of the high-tech school..in a way. Meanwhile, in the world above, Allie was having the time of her life. Sitting on her fellow classmates was always her favorite pastime, but now she could possibly have a permanent super seat. "He's so comfy, and pretty cute too" she thought to herself. Allie turned her around to see that her cheeks were practically spilling out of her seat "Those extra twinkies really paid off, no one will notice I'm sitting on him! Once I get him home, I've gotta find the best seat in the house and put him there. I'll get my best maid to carry me around all day, and I'll be comfy forever! Though, we do have like 1,000,000 chairs, finding one's gonna be tricky. Unless...I find more... she thought until a metallic voice caught her attention. "Miss Jinto" said I-902, the robotic teacher. Allie quickly turned her head to her teacher as the other kids began to laugh. "I implore you to pay attention Miss Jinto, or there will be consequence for your grades." Allie quickly responded with "I was, I promise!" "Really", the robot said, "Well, can you tell me capital of Minnesota? "Hey, wait, did someone leave a basket of kittens outside!" she said. The whole class suddenly got excited as they looked away from her to the window. Despite not liking Allie, they couldn't resist the idea of getting new pets.

As the robot teacher tried to calm them, Allie tried to lift up her butt cheek to find Rai, but it was hard to lift what felt like gelatin. "Butt, why do you have to be so big, please show me Rai!" she said until she finally managed to find him. "Are you finally letting me go?" he said with his tiny voice. "No!" Allie said but quickly adjusted her tone when she saw Rai with his hands over his ears. "I mean, no, please Rai, I need to know the capital of Minni soda" Rai looked confused, "You mean Minnesota?" he said. "Yeah, whatever! Do you know the answer?" Rai got a smug look on his face, "Of course, it's super easy, but why would I tell you?" Allie, in turn, got a worried look on her face, "Well, cause we're friends r-right?" Rai, in turn, put on a look that made Allie want to smush again and forget the last 30 minutes even happened. "Well," he began, "I wouldn't exactly call a girl who slammed her huge butt on me, bounced her butt on me, and then FARTED on me, my friend." he finished and turned his head. Even at his small size, Allie didn't like Rai when he was angry, but she needed this answer. "Please Rai, if I don't get this right, my parents will be really mad, they may even...they may even take away my candy!" Rai thought for a moment about how much he didn't care. "So what, eating healthy gets you a smaller butt anyway." Allie didn't want to do this but, "Ok Rai, you asked for this!" Rai braced for another butt slam, but instead he looked up to see the most convincing puppy dog eyes he had ever seen. Allie's big brown eyes practically stared into his soul. "Pretty please, Rai" she said in a cutesy voice. Rai hesitated as the other students began to walk back to their desks, all disappointed and with a fresh hatred for Allie. He really didn't want to give his torturer the answer...but... those eyes...were just so..."FINE! It's St. Paul!" Allie's puppy dog eyed face turned back into a smile. She began to move her butt back over Rai, but not before Emily, the girl sitting next to Allie, once again caught a glimpse of Rai that literally dropped her jaw to the floor.

"Sorry about that teacher, it was just a guy with basket of oranges" Allie said timdly. "Well, Ms. Jinto, do you know the answer" the robot said. "The answer is...St...Paul?" Allie said with while crossing her fingers. "Hmmm...correct...very good Miss Jinto." Allie's excitement caused her to jump out of her seat, until she was 10 feet in the air while a fanfair and mirage of colors burst around her. After a few seconds, she fell back on her chair and smushed Rai. "Sorry, it happens when I get excited" she said apologetically. "I'm well aware" the teacher said and continued on with the lesson. While the teacher turned, Allie leaned towards her seat. "Um-Thanks Rai. I-I'm only gonna sit for a little longer." Even though she wanted to sit on him forever, Allie decided that it was best to help Rai out and hand him in at the end of class. Rai still didn't know why he told her the answer after what she'd done to him. He had to admit not everything was gross about Allie. If only her personality was as cute.

Eventually the class ended. At this point, Rai expected the other kids to call him pancake boy if they saw him. Allie's butt crushed him flatter than paper, and even while the students were sent to recess by the teacher, she remained in her chair to savor her last moments with Rai. After the last student left the class to recess,Allie finally got up. Rai felt like all his troubles were over as the dark, stinky mass over him lifted to reveal light and clean air. "All right, little guy, let's get you cured" Allie said to him. Rai looked up at her. He didn't feel like getting mad at her anymore; he was just glad to not be a seat-cushion anymore. "Great...wait you're not gonna put me in your sock or anything, right?" he said to her timidly. Just then, a hand grabbed Allie's arm and turned her around. Standing in front of her with a face even scarier than Rai's earlier was Emily, Allie's most recent "super-seat." "Uh. Emmy, hi" Allie said as she quickly moved Rai behind her back, "nice new dress, love the yellow, sh-shouldn't you be in the park?" Emily looked over Allie as intensely as a 6-year old could. A red glow seemed to form around her as she started her first interrogation. "So, Allie, whatcha got there" she asked in a scary voice. "Um..got where..Emmy?" she said. "You know what I mean Allie. While you were doing your little...er...jump party thing, I saw something on your chair that looked like a boy." Emily responded. Allie tried to put on a confused face again. "I-I have no idea what you're talking about Emmy. Tiny boy's don't exist, silly" she said. Emily looked at her like that one detective Allie saw on a crime show with her dad once. "Allie, alot of weird things happen here. Just last week we had a giant squid in the school pool, and a pirate ship hunting it! I'm pretty a tiny boy can come here, and of all the students you would be the one to sit on him with your big butt!." Allie was really getting scared. Emily grabbed Allie's other arm that was holding Rai, while Rai was being tossed around so much he thought he was going to hurl. "Emmy...please...I'm just trying to...Uh!" Allie had enough. She turned around showing Emily her worst fear, and bumped it into her stomach knocking her down. "Take this!" she said as she jumped and slammed her butt down on Emily's stomach. Yet, she also felt a strange sense of opportunity now that she had two shrunken classmates. What does she do?

Didn’t that happen to the lunch robot last week?” The other kids didn’t want to provoke her and become future seats, so they nodded in agreement. “I’ll go tell the principle, maybe we’ll get outta school early.” the girl finally said as she ran off. Eventually, she returned saying that the principle sent an alert to all the kids’ personal drivers to take them home until the school’s fixes their evil scientist problem. While the other kids cheered and ran back outside, Allie cast a malicious grin to Emily and Rai. Rai tried to apologize “Al, look I’m really sorry for yelling at you, can you…” Allie put her pinky finger over Rai’s mouth. “I’m gonna stop you right there Rai” she said as she pulled out a purple smart phone. “Oooooo, looks like Mr. Rothschild's here. And the seats in his car are made out of cotton, which is the least comfortable for me. Soooo” she said as she grabbed the two.

No, please, let me go!” Emily screamed. “What about my family! They can’t find me as a tattoo on your butt!” Allie looked down at her as she walked out the school. “Oh, come on Emmy. It can’t have been that bad being my seat cushion, was it Rai?” Rai was still frightened, but he simply nodded which made Emily scream more. “Someone help me! Allie’s gonna sit on me! Help!” With a swift motion, Allie stopped. “Yeesh, Emily you talk too much” she thought as the kids looked up at her in surprise. She stared down at them with her finger on her chin, until she snapped her fingers. “I know just what to do with you, little miss chatterbox. I got that one from mr. men.” The two in her palm still stared at her while blinking their eyes. “It’s like the best tv show ever, mr. bump is my favorite and...you know what never mind. See ya later, Emmy.” Emily continued to scream as she was moved to the back of Allie’s jeans, where she one again got up close and personal with her worst nightmare. “No, no! Noooo!” she said as Allie put her in her back pocket. Emily’s screams were finally muffled as Allie’s fat cheek covered her whole body. “Ah, that’s better, now to the car!”
Mr. Rothschild opened the door of the 20 ft. limo for his young mistress. “Afternoon milady” he said. “I do hope everything was alright at school today.” Allie looked to him with a cute gapped-tooth smile that always brightened his day. “It was, Mr. R. But I can’t wait to get home. I’m starving.” Rothschild closed her door and got in the driver’s seat. “No need to worry milady, we’ll be home in a jiffy.” Allie pretty much slammed her butt into the comfy back seat, crushing the poor girl in her back pocket. Like Rai, Emily was pulverized by Allie's massive rump. As she was being turned into mush, she thought about how this was a million times worse then when Allie sat on her at recess. At least then, her face wasn't being smushed by a ton of flab, and her nose wasn't being assaulted by the scent of un-washed butt. Through her squished mouth, Emily tried to plead with Allie. "Allie, please, your butt's crushing me, it's so gross" but she could only get out tiny muffles.

Allie smirked as she felt Emily squirm under her butt . "Look at the bright side, at least you know not to be a total jerk next time. Maybe if your nice I'll let you sleep in my dollhouse, though I'll have to get Aunt Cassie to move out of their first." she said as she wiggled her bum on poor Emmy. Rai, who was in Allie's shirt pocket, couldn't help but feel sorry for Emily as she being sat on like he was. Above all, he hoped that their parents or the police would find out they were being used as butt-cushions, though he feared that Allie had a plan for that already. Even though she wasn't that smart in school, she sure knew how to lie.

Eventually, Rothschild pulled his car into the family garage. After about 5 minutes, he reached his parking space, and let Allie out of the car. "Thanks Mr. R, could you wait outside for a sec, I need to find something in my backpack." she said. "Of course milady. Take all the time you need" he responded and walked to the back of the limo, After waiting until he was out of sight, Allie jumped up from her seat and stood in the middle of the limo. She pulled the two tinies from her pockets, and began to laugh when she saw Emily. Her hair and dress were drenched in butt sweat, and she smelled like she got attacked by a skunk army. Rai tried to convince Allie not to put them together, but she placed them both in the same hand, causing Rai to gag at the stench. "Sorry, Emmy, Mr. R always goes crazy with the heat." Emmy tried to yell at her, but she didn't want to open her mouth to the taste of sweat. "Anyway, welcome to my lovely home. We're gonna do alot of fun things here!" she said. Rai panicked. He knew this was the end of the line, so he had to ask. "Uh, like what Allie...?" Allie looked down at Rai with the same brown eyes he thought were cute a few hours ago. "Well..."

info.brief_description: What happens when a first grade boy shrinks in a school for the rich?
info.description:
You play young first grader Rai Smith, a boy who was already short for his age, who has to survive his school after he has mysteriously shrunk to the size of a Lego man. You must decide which of your fellow students you can trust and which one you cannot as you try to figure out a way to return to normal. Choose wisely.

Rules:

1.No direct adult interaction please.

2. The school is a k-5 for rich kids so please keep the ages accordingly.

3. Kids can be either mean or nice but that is for you guys to decide

4. No Pov chapters please, there can be a half and half chapter where half is a pov and the other is the main character but besides that no pov.

5. No shrinking or growing please, this means no other characters sizes can change and once Rai has shrunken the first time he won't shrink anymore and will only grow if its the last chapter of a branch.

6. No age or gender changes, just no.

Otherwise there can be diapers, he can be swallowed, farted on, he can be turned into a object, but please follow the rules.

Edit: Will give 100 gps to users who post decent 2 paragraphs or more chapters. If you are feeling more adventurous though I will give 500 to users who post 3 2 paragraphs or more chapters but the 3 chapters have to be on the same day.
